argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | rrhfe.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ( dist ` R ) |` ( B X. B ) ) = ( ( dist ` R ) |` ( B X. B ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( topGen ` ran (,) ) = ( topGen ` ran (,) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( TopOpen ` R ) = ( TopOpen ` R ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ZMod ` R ) = ( ZMod ` R ) |
| 6 |  | #P_rrextdrg | |- ( R e. RRExt -> R e. DivRing ) |
| 7 |  | #P_rrextnrg | |- ( R e. RRExt -> R e. NrmRing ) |
| 8 | 5 | #P_rrextnlm | |- ( R e. RRExt -> ( ZMod ` R ) e. NrmMod ) |
| 9 |  | #P_rrextchr | |- ( R e. RRExt -> ( chr ` R ) = 0 ) |
| 10 |  | #P_rrextcusp | |- ( R e. RRExt -> R e. CUnifSp ) |
| 11 | 1, 2 | #P_rrextust | |- ( R e. RRExt -> ( UnifSt ` R ) = ( metUnif ` ( ( dist ` R ) |` ( B X. B ) ) ) ) |
| 12 | 2, 3, 1, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11 | #P_rrhf | |- ( R e. RRExt -> ( RRHom ` R ) : RR --> B ) |
